languages.text: "Я же говорила — жалостливая сказочка, и вот мы уже на шаг ближе к цели. Хотя есть и более быстрые способы добиться желаемого".

traits.locale_text: "Я же говорила — жалостливая сказочка, и вот мы уже на шаг ближе к цели. Хотя есть и более быстрые способы добиться желаемого".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Didn't I tell you? One little sob story and we're already one step closer to our goal. Although, there are faster methods of doing that."
languages.original_text: "Я же говорила — жалостливая сказочка, и вот мы уже на шаг ближе к цели. Хотя есть и более быстрые способы добиться желаемого".

traits.locale_text: "Didn't I tell you? One little sob story and we're already one step closer to our goal. Although, there are faster methods of doing that."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Didn't I tell you? One little sob story and we're already one step closer to our goal. Although, there are faster methods of doing that."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Didn't I tell you? One little sob story and we're already one step closer to our goal. Although, there are faster methods of doing that."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Didn't I tell you? One little sob story and we're already one step closer to our goal. Although, there are faster methods of doing that."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我不是说过了吗？只要讲个小小的、令人悲伤的故事，就可以离目标更近一步了。不过，看来还有更快的方法朝目标前进。”
languages.original_text: "Didn't I tell you? One little sob story and we're already one step closer to our goal. Although, there are faster methods of doing that."

traits.locale_text: “我不是说过了吗？只要讲个小小的、令人悲伤的故事，就可以离目标更近一步了。不过，看来还有更快的方法朝目标前进。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Se lo dije: una historia triste y ya estamos un paso más cerca de nuestro objetivo. Aunque también hay métodos más rápidos...».
languages.original_text: "Didn't I tell you? One little sob story and we're already one step closer to our goal. Although, there are faster methods of doing that."

traits.locale_text: «Se lo dije: una historia triste y ya estamos un paso más cerca de nuestro objetivo. Aunque también hay métodos más rápidos...».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「言ったとおりでしょう？お涙ちょうだいの話ひとつでゴールに一歩近づける。これよりもっと早く進める方法はあるのだけれど」
languages.original_text: "Didn't I tell you? One little sob story and we're already one step closer to our goal. Although, there are faster methods of doing that."

traits.locale_text: 「言ったとおりでしょう？お涙ちょうだいの話ひとつでゴールに一歩近づける。これよりもっと早く進める方法はあるのだけれど」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous l'avais bien dit ! Une petite histoire larmoyante à souhait, et nous voilà un peu plus près de notre objectif. Encore qu'il existe des méthodes plus rapides pour arriver au même résultat. »
languages.original_text: "Didn't I tell you? One little sob story and we're already one step closer to our goal. Although, there are faster methods of doing that."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous l'avais bien dit ! Une petite histoire larmoyante à souhait, et nous voilà un peu plus près de notre objectif. Encore qu'il existe des méthodes plus rapides pour arriver au même résultat. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Habe ich's nicht gesagt? Ein Druck auf die Tränendrüsen, und wir sind unserem Ziel einen Schritt näher. Obgleich es schnellere Methoden gibt, das zu erreichen."
languages.original_text: "Didn't I tell you? One little sob story and we're already one step closer to our goal. Although, there are faster methods of doing that."

traits.locale_text: "Habe ich's nicht gesagt? Ein Druck auf die Tränendrüsen, und wir sind unserem Ziel einen Schritt näher. Obgleich es schnellere Methoden gibt, das zu erreichen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ben sana demedim mi? Acıklı tek bir hikâyeyle şimdiden hedefimize bir adım yaklaştık. Gerçi bunu başarmanın daha hızlı yolları da var."
languages.original_text: "Didn't I tell you? One little sob story and we're already one step closer to our goal. Although, there are faster methods of doing that."
